move.name: Megahorn
move.description: "Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup."

move.name: Attack Order
move.description: "The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Bug Buzz
move.description: "The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: X-Scissor
move.description: "The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors."

move.name: Signal Beam
move.description: "The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target."

move.name: U-turn
move.description: "After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting."

move.name: Steamroller
move.description: "The user crushes its foes by rolling over them. This attack may make the target flinch."

move.name: Bug Bite
move.description: "The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect."

move.name: Silver Wind
move.description: "The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats."

move.name: Struggle Bug
move.description: "While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced."

move.name: Twineedle
move.description: "The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target."

move.name: Fury Cutter
move.description: "The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession."

move.name: Leech Life
move.description: "The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target."

move.name: Pin Missile
move.description: "Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row."

move.name: Defend Order
move.description: "The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats."

move.name: Heal Order
move.description: "The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP."

move.name: Quiver Dance
move.description: "The user performs a beautiful dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats."

move.name: Rage Powder
move.description: "The user scatters irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user."

move.name: Spider Web
move.description: "The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle."

move.name: String Shot
move.description: "The foe is bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the target's Speed."

move.name: Tail Glow
move.description: "The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Foul Play
move.description: "The user turns the foe's power against it. It does more damage the higher the target's Attack stat."

move.name: Night Daze
move.description: "The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target's accuracy."

move.name: Crunch
move.description: "The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat."

move.name: Dark Pulse
move.description: "The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Sucker Punch
move.description: "This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however."

move.name: Night Slash
move.description: "The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Bite
move.description: "The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch."

move.name: Feint Attack
move.description: "The user draws up to the foe disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail."

move.name: Snarl
move.description: "The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target's Sp. Atk stat decrease."

move.name: Assurance
move.description: "If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled."

move.name: Payback
move.description: "If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled."

move.name: Pursuit
move.description: "An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle."

move.name: Thief
move.description: "The user attacks and steals the foe's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item."

move.name: Knock Off
move.description: "The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle."

move.name: Beat Up
move.description: "The user gets all the party Pokémon to attack the foe. The more party Pokémon, the more damage."

move.name: Fling
move.description: "The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item."

move.name: Punishment
move.description: "This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes."

move.name: Dark Void
move.description: "Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep."

move.name: Embargo
move.description: "It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it."

move.name: Fake Tears
move.description: "The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Flatter
move.description: "Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, it also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Hone Claws
move.description: "The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy."

move.name: Memento
move.description: "The user faints when using this move. In return, it harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk."

move.name: Nasty Plot
move.description: "The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk."

move.name: Quash
move.description: "The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last."

move.name: Snatch
move.description: "The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the foe attempts to use."

move.name: Switcheroo
move.description: "The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow."

move.name: Taunt
move.description: "The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns."

move.name: Torment
move.description: "The user torments and enrages the foe, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row."

move.name: Roar of Time
move.description: "The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn."

move.name: Draco Meteor
move.description: "Comets are summoned down from the sky. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Outrage
move.description: "The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however."

move.name: Dragon Rush
move.description: "The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Spacial Rend
move.description: "The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Dragon Pulse
move.description: "The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth."

move.name: Dragon Claw
move.description: "The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws."

move.name: Dragon Tail
move.description: "The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends."

move.name: Dragon Breath
move.description: "The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Dual Chop
move.description: "The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row."

move.name: Twister
move.description: "The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch."

move.name: Dragon Rage
move.description: "This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage."

move.name: Dragon Dance
move.description: "The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats."

move.name: Bolt Strike
move.description: "The user charges at its foe, surrounding itself with lightning. It may also leave the target paralyzed."

move.name: Thunder
move.description: "A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed."

move.name: Volt Tackle
move.description: "The user electrifies itself, then charges at the foe. It causes considerable damage to the user as well."

move.name: Zap Cannon
move.description: "The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis."

move.name: Fusion Bolt
move.description: "The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. It does more damage if influenced by an enormous flame."

move.name: Thunderbolt
move.description: "A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Wild Charge
move.description: "The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its foe. It also damages the user a little."

move.name: Discharge
move.description: "A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis."

move.name: Thunder Punch
move.description: "The target is punched with an electrified fist. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Volt Switch
move.description: "After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting."

move.name: Spark
move.description: "The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Thunder Fang
move.description: "The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis."

move.name: Shock Wave
move.description: "The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack cannot be evaded."

move.name: Electroweb
move.description: "The user captures and attacks foes by using an electric net, which lowers their Speed stat."

move.name: Charge Beam
move.description: "The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Thunder Shock
move.description: "A jolt of electricity is hurled at the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Electro Ball
move.description: "The user hurls an electric orb at the foe. It does more damage the faster the user is."

move.name: Charge
move.description: "The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses next. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Magnet Rise
move.description: "The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns."

move.name: Thunder Wave
move.description: "A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits."

move.name: Focus Punch
move.description: "The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. It will fail if the user is hit before it is used."

move.name: High Jump Kick
move.description: "The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead."

move.name: Close Combat
move.description: "The user fights the foe up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def."

move.name: Focus Blast
move.description: "The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def."

move.name: Superpower
move.description: "The user attacks the target with great power. However, it also lowers the user's Attack and Defense."

move.name: Cross Chop
move.description: "The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Dynamic Punch
move.description: "The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. It confuses the target if it hits."

move.name: Hammer Arm
move.description: "The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however."

move.name: Jump Kick
move.description: "The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself."

move.name: Aura Sphere
move.description: "The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit."

move.name: Sacred Sword
move.description: "The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage."

move.name: Secret Sword
move.description: "The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in it does physical damage to the foe."

move.name: Sky Uppercut
move.description: "The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force."

move.name: Submission
move.description: "The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly."

move.name: Brick Break
move.description: "The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect."

move.name: Drain Punch
move.description: "An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target."

move.name: Vital Throw
move.description: "The user attacks last. In return, this throw move is guaranteed not to miss."

move.name: Circle Throw
move.description: "The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends."

move.name: Force Palm
move.description: "The target is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Low Sweep
move.description: "The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat."

move.name: Revenge
move.description: "An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn."

move.name: Rolling Kick
move.description: "The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Wake-Up Slap
move.description: "This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however."

move.name: Karate Chop
move.description: "The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Mach Punch
move.description: "The user throws a punch at blinding speed. It is certain to strike first."

move.name: Rock Smash
move.description: "The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the foe's Defense stat."

move.name: Storm Throw
move.description: "The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit."

move.name: Vacuum Wave
move.description: "The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first."

move.name: Double Kick
move.description: "The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet."

move.name: Arm Thrust
move.description: "The user looses a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row."

move.name: Triple Kick
move.description: "A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit."

move.name: Counter
move.description: "A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken."

move.name: Final Gambit
move.description: "The user risks all to attack the foe. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP."

move.name: Low Kick
move.description: "A powerful low kick that makes the foe fall over. It inflicts greater damage on heavier foes."

move.name: Reversal
move.description: "An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has."

move.name: Seismic Toss
move.description: "The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level."

move.name: Bulk Up
move.description: "The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats."

move.name: Detect
move.description: "It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession."

move.name: Quick Guard
move.description: "The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If may fail if used in succession."

move.name: V-create
move.description: "With a fiery forehead, the user hurls itself at the foe. It lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed."

move.name: Blast Burn
move.description: "The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user must rest on the next turn, however."

move.name: Eruption
move.description: "The user attacks in an explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful this attack becomes."

move.name: Overheat
move.description: "The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Blue Flare
move.description: "The user attacks by engulfing the foe in a beautiful, yet intense, blue flame. It may also burn the foe."

move.name: Fire Blast
move.description: "The foe is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Flare Blitz
move.description: "The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user also takes damage and may burn the target."

move.name: Magma Storm
move.description: "The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for four to five turns."

move.name: Fusion Flare
move.description: "The user brings down a giant flame. It does more damage if influenced by an enormous thunderbolt."

move.name: Heat Wave
move.description: "The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn."

move.name: Inferno
move.description: "The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn."

move.name: Sacred Fire
move.description: "The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Searing Shot
move.description: "An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave the foe with a burn."

move.name: Flamethrower
move.description: "The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Blaze Kick
move.description: "The user launches a kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Fiery Dance
move.description: "Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Lava Plume
move.description: "An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn."

move.name: Fire Punch
move.description: "The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Flame Burst
move.description: "The user attacks the foe with a bursting flame. It also damages Pokémon next to the target."

move.name: Fire Fang
move.description: "The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned."

move.name: Flame Wheel
move.description: "The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Fire Pledge
move.description: "A column of fire hits opposing Pokémon. When used with its Grass equivalent, it makes a sea of fire."

move.name: Flame Charge
move.description: "The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat."

move.name: Ember
move.description: "The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Fire Spin
move.description: "The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns."

move.name: Incinerate
move.description: "The user attacks the foe with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, it becomes burnt up and unusable."

move.name: Heat Crash
move.description: "The user slams the foe with its flaming body. The heavier the user is, the greater the damage."

move.name: Sunny Day
move.description: "The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves."

move.name: Will-O-Wisp
move.description: "The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn."

move.name: Sky Attack
move.description: "A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Brave Bird
move.description: "The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage."

move.name: Hurricane
move.description: "The user wraps its foe in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the foe."

move.name: Aeroblast
move.description: "A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Fly
move.description: "The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town."

move.name: Bounce
move.description: "The user bounces up high, then drops on the foe on the second turn. It may also paralyze the foe."

move.name: Drill Peck
move.description: "A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill."

move.name: Air Slash
move.description: "The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Aerial Ace
move.description: "The user confounds the foe with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail."

move.name: Chatter
move.description: "The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the target."

move.name: Pluck
move.description: "The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect."

move.name: Sky Drop
move.description: "The user takes the foe into the sky, then drops it on the next turn. The foe cannot attack while airborne."

move.name: Wing Attack
move.description: "The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage."

move.name: Acrobatics
move.description: "The user nimbly strikes the foe. This attack does more damage if the user is not holding an item."

move.name: Air Cutter
move.description: "The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Gust
move.description: "A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage."

move.name: Peck
move.description: "The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn."

move.name: Defog
move.description: "A strong wind blows away the foe's obstacles such as Light Screen. It also lowers their evasion."

move.name: Feather Dance
move.description: "The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat."

move.name: Mirror Move
move.description: "The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move."

move.name: Roost
move.description: "The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP."

move.name: Tailwind
move.description: "The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns."

move.name: Shadow Force
move.description: "The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe protects itself."

move.name: Shadow Ball
move.description: "The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Shadow Claw
move.description: "The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Ominous Wind
move.description: "The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once."

move.name: Shadow Punch
move.description: "The user throws a punch from the shadows. The punch lands without fail."

move.name: Hex
move.description: "This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems."

move.name: Shadow Sneak
move.description: "The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first."

move.name: Astonish
move.description: "The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Lick
move.description: "The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Night Shade
move.description: "The user makes the foe see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level."

move.name: Confuse Ray
move.description: "The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion."

move.name: Curse
move.description: "A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all the other types."

move.name: Destiny Bond
move.description: "When this move is used, if the user faints, the foe that landed the knockout hit also faints."

move.name: Grudge
move.description: "If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the foe's move that knocked it out."

move.name: Nightmare
move.description: "A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn."

move.name: Spite
move.description: "The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it."

move.name: Frenzy Plant
move.description: "The user slams the target with an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn."

move.name: Leaf Storm
move.description: "A storm of sharp is whipped up. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Petal Dance
move.description: "The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused."

move.name: Power Whip
move.description: "The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target."

move.name: Seed Flare
move.description: "The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may harshly lower the target's Sp. Def."

move.name: Solar Beam
move.description: "A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn."

move.name: Wood Hammer
move.description: "The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. The user also sustains serious damage."

move.name: Leaf Blade
move.description: "The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by slashing. It has a high critical-hit ratio."

move.name: Energy Ball
move.description: "The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def."

move.name: Seed Bomb
move.description: "The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above."

move.name: Giga Drain
move.description: "A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target."

move.name: Horn Leech
move.description: "The user drains the foe's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage inflicted."

move.name: Leaf Tornado
move.description: "The user attacks its foe by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the foe's accuracy."

move.name: Magical Leaf
move.description: "The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack will not miss."

move.name: Needle Arm
move.description: "The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Razor Leaf
move.description: "Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Grass Pledge
move.description: "A column of grass hits the foes. When used with its water equivalent, it creates a vast swamp."

move.name: Mega Drain
move.description: "A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target."

move.name: Vine Whip
move.description: "The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage."

move.name: Bullet Seed
move.description: "The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession."

move.name: Absorb
move.description: "A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target."

move.name: Grass Knot
move.description: "The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage."

move.name: Aromatherapy
move.description: "The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party."

move.name: Cotton Guard
move.description: "The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising its Defense stat."

move.name: Cotton Spore
move.description: "The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the foe, harshly reducing its Speed stat."

move.name: Grass Whistle
move.description: "The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep."

move.name: Ingrain
move.description: "The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out."

move.name: Leech Seed
move.description: "A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn."

move.name: Sleep Powder
move.description: "The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target."

move.name: Spore
move.description: "The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep."

move.name: Stun Spore
move.description: "The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Synthesis
move.description: "The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather."

move.name: Worry Seed
move.description: "A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia."

move.name: Earthquake
move.description: "The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it."

move.name: Earth Power
move.description: "The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def."

move.name: Dig
move.description: "The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons."

move.name: Drill Run
move.description: "The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Bone Club
move.description: "The user clubs the target with a bone. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Mud Bomb
move.description: "The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy."

move.name: Bulldoze
move.description: "The user strikes everything around it by stomping on the ground. It reduces hit Pokémon's Speed."

move.name: Mud Shot
move.description: "The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed."

move.name: Bonemerang
move.description: "The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going."

move.name: Sand Tomb
move.description: "The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns."

move.name: Bone Rush
move.description: "The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row."

move.name: Mud-Slap
move.description: "The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy."

move.name: Fissure
move.description: "The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the foe in. The target instantly faints if it hits."

move.name: Magnitude
move.description: "The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies."

move.name: Mud Sport
move.description: "The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle."

move.name: Sand Attack
move.description: "Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy."

move.name: Spikes
move.description: "The user lays a trap of spikes at the foe's feet. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle."

move.name: Freeze Shock
move.description: "On the second turn, the user hits the foe with electrically charged ice. It may also paralyze the foe."

move.name: Ice Burn
move.description: "On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the foe. This may leave it with a burn."

move.name: Blizzard
move.description: "A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid."

move.name: Ice Beam
move.description: "The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid."

move.name: Icicle Crash
move.description: "The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the foe. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Ice Punch
move.description: "The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen."

move.name: Aurora Beam
move.description: "The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat."

move.name: Glaciate
move.description: "The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at the foe. This attack reduces the targets' Speed stat."

move.name: Ice Fang
move.description: "The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen."

move.name: Avalanche
move.description: "An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn."

move.name: Icy Wind
move.description: "The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also lowers the targets' Speed stat."

move.name: Frost Breath
move.description: "The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit."

move.name: Ice Shard
move.description: "The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first."

move.name: Powder Snow
move.description: "The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets."

move.name: Ice Ball
move.description: "The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits."

move.name: Icicle Spear
move.description: "The user launches sharp icicles at the target. It strikes two to five times in a row."

move.name: Sheer Cold
move.description: "The foe is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits."

move.name: Hail
move.description: "The user summons a hail storm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type."

move.name: Haze
move.description: "The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle."

move.name: Mist
move.description: "The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns."

move.name: Explosion
move.description: "The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move."

move.name: Self-Destruct
move.description: "The user blows up to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move."

move.name: Giga Impact
move.description: "The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn."

move.name: Hyper Beam
move.description: "The foe is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy."

move.name: Last Resort
move.description: "This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle."

move.name: Double-Edge
move.description: "A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however."

move.name: Head Charge
move.description: "The user charges its head into the foe, using its powerful guard hair. The user also takes damage."

move.name: Mega Kick
move.description: "The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power."

move.name: Thrash
move.description: "The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however."

move.name: Egg Bomb
move.description: "A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage."

move.name: Judgment
move.description: "The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding."

move.name: Skull Bash
move.description: "The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense in the first turn, then rams the foe on the next turn."

move.name: Hyper Voice
move.description: "The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage."

move.name: Rock Climb
move.description: "The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. It may also confuse the target."

move.name: Take Down
move.description: "A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the foe. It also damages the user a little."

move.name: Uproar
move.description: "The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep."

move.name: Body Slam
move.description: "The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may leave the target with paralysis."

move.name: Techno Blast
move.description: "The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds."

move.name: Extreme Speed
move.description: "The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move."

move.name: Hyper Fang
move.description: "The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Mega Punch
move.description: "The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power."

move.name: Razor Wind
move.description: "A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit the foe on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Slam
move.description: "The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage."

move.name: Strength
move.description: "The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move heavy boulders."

move.name: Tri Attack
move.description: "The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also paralyze, burn, or freeze the target."

move.name: Crush Claw
move.description: "The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. It may also lower the target's Defense."

move.name: Relic Song
move.description: "An ancient song appeals to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep."

move.name: Chip Away
move.description: "Seeking an opening, the user strikes continually. The foe's stat changes don't affect the damage."

move.name: Dizzy Punch
move.description: "The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused."

move.name: Facade
move.description: "An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis."

move.name: Headbutt
move.description: "The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging into the foe. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Retaliate
move.description: "Gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the last turn, this attack's damage increases."

move.name: Secret Power
move.description: "The user attacks with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user's environment."

move.name: Slash
move.description: "The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Horn Attack
move.description: "The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage."

move.name: Stomp
move.description: "The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Covet
move.description: "The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item."

move.name: Round
move.description: "The user attacks with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage."

move.name: Smelling Salts
move.description: "This attack inflicts double damage on a paralyzed foe. It also cures the target's paralysis, however."

move.name: Swift
move.description: "Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses."

move.name: Vice Grip
move.description: "The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage."

move.name: Cut
move.description: "The target is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees."

move.name: Struggle
move.description: "An attack that is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also hurts the user slightly."

move.name: Tackle
move.description: "A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body."

move.name: Weather Ball
move.description: "An attack move that varies in power and type depending on the weather."

move.name: Echoed Voice
move.description: "The user attacks the foe with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage."

move.name: Fake Out
move.description: "An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle."

move.name: False Swipe
move.description: "A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP."

move.name: Pay Day
move.description: "Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after battle."

move.name: Pound
move.description: "The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc."

move.name: Quick Attack
move.description: "The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first."

move.name: Scratch
move.description: "Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage."

move.name: Snore
move.description: "An attack that can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Double Hit
move.description: "The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row."

move.name: Feint
move.description: "An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves."

move.name: Tail Slap
move.description: "The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the Pokémon two to five times in a row."

move.name: Rage
move.description: "As long as this move is in use, the user's Attack rises each time the user is hit in battle."

move.name: Rapid Spin
move.description: "A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes."

move.name: Spike Cannon
move.description: "Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row."

move.name: Comet Punch
move.description: "The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row."

move.name: Fury Swipes
move.description: "The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession."

move.name: Barrage
move.description: "Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row."

move.name: Bind
move.description: "Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the foe for four to five turns."

move.name: Double Slap
move.description: "The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row."

move.name: Fury Attack
move.description: "The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row."

move.name: Wrap
move.description: "A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns."

move.name: Constrict
move.description: "The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed."

move.name: Bide
move.description: "The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken."

move.name: Crush Grip
move.description: "The target is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the target has left."

move.name: Endeavor
move.description: "An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP."

move.name: Flail
move.description: "The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has."

move.name: Frustration
move.description: "A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer."

move.name: Guillotine
move.description: "A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits."

move.name: Hidden Power
move.description: "A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokémon using it."

move.name: Horn Drill
move.description: "The user stabs the foe with a horn that rotates like a drill. If it hits, the target faints instantly."

move.name: Natural Gift
move.description: "The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power."

move.name: Present
move.description: "The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however."

move.name: Return
move.description: "A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer."

move.name: Sonic Boom
move.description: "The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage."

move.name: Spit Up
move.description: "The power stored using the move Stockpile is released all at once in an attack."

move.name: Super Fang
move.description: "The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. It cuts the target's HP to half."

move.name: Trump Card
move.description: "The fewer PP this move has, the greater its attack power."

move.name: Wring Out
move.description: "The user powerfully wrings the foe. The more HP the foe has, the greater this attack's power."

move.name: Acupressure
move.description: "The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats."

move.name: After You
move.description: "The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user."

move.name: Assist
move.description: "The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party."

move.name: Attract
move.description: "If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack."

move.name: Baton Pass
move.description: "The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes."

move.name: Belly Drum
move.description: "The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP."

move.name: Bestow
move.description: "The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item."

move.name: Block
move.description: "The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape."

move.name: Camouflage
move.description: "The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave."

move.name: Captivate
move.description: "If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Charm
move.description: "The user charmingly gazes at the foe, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered."

move.name: Conversion
move.description: "The user changes its type to become the same type as one of its moves."

move.name: Conversion 2
move.description: "The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last."

move.name: Copycat
move.description: "The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet."

move.name: Defense Curl
move.description: "The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat."

move.name: Disable
move.description: "For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used."

move.name: Double Team
move.description: "By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness."

move.name: Encore
move.description: "The user compels the target to keep using only the move it last used for three turns."

move.name: Endure
move.description: "The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession."

move.name: Entrainment
move.description: "The user dances to compel the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's."

move.name: Flash
move.description: "The user flashes a light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves."

move.name: Focus Energy
move.description: "The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Follow Me
move.description: "The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user."

move.name: Foresight
move.description: "Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any kind of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe."

move.name: Glare
move.description: "The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis."

move.name: Growl
move.description: "The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The foe's Attack stat is lowered."

move.name: Growth
move.description: "The user's body grows all at once, raising the Atk and Sp. Atk stats."

move.name: Harden
move.description: "The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat."

move.name: Heal Bell
move.description: "The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon."

move.name: Helping Hand
move.description: "The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack."

move.name: Howl
move.description: "The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, boosting its Attack stat."

move.name: Leer
move.description: "The user gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The target's Defense stat is reduced."

move.name: Lock-On
move.description: "The user takes sure aim at the target. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target."

move.name: Lovely Kiss
move.description: "With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it suceeds, the target falls asleep."

move.name: Lucky Chant
move.description: "The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing the foe from landing critical hits."

move.name: Me First
move.description: "The user tries to cut ahead of the foe to steal and use the foe's intended move with greater power."

move.name: Mean Look
move.description: "The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee."

move.name: Metronome
move.description: "The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move."

move.name: Milk Drink
move.description: "The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP."

move.name: Mimic
move.description: "The user copies the move last used by the foe. The move can be used until the user is switched out."

move.name: Mind Reader
move.description: "The user senses the foe's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the foe."

move.name: Minimize
move.description: "The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness."

move.name: Moonlight
move.description: "The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather."

move.name: Morning Sun
move.description: "The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather."

move.name: Nature Power
move.description: "An attack that makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment."

move.name: Odor Sleuth
move.description: "Enables the user to hit a Ghost type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe."

move.name: Pain Split
move.description: "The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target."

move.name: Perish Song
move.description: "Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle."

move.name: Protect
move.description: "It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession."

move.name: Psych Up
move.description: "The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target."

move.name: Recover
move.description: "Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP."

move.name: Recycle
move.description: "The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again."

move.name: Reflect Type
move.description: "The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target."

move.name: Refresh
move.description: "The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis."

move.name: Roar
move.description: "The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends."

move.name: Safeguard
move.description: "The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns."

move.name: Scary Face
move.description: "The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat."

move.name: Screech
move.description: "An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat."

move.name: Sharpen
move.description: "The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat."

move.name: Shell Smash
move.description: "The user breaks its shell, lowering its defenses but sharply raising attacking and Speed stats."

move.name: Simple Beam
move.description: "The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple."

move.name: Sing
move.description: "A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber."

move.name: Sketch
move.description: "It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the foe. Once used, Sketch disappears."

move.name: Slack Off
move.description: "The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP."

move.name: Sleep Talk
move.description: "While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows."

move.name: Smokescreen
move.description: "The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy."

move.name: Soft-Boiled
move.description: "The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. May also be used in the field to heal HP."

move.name: Splash
move.description: "The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all..."

move.name: Stockpile
move.description: "The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times."

move.name: Substitute
move.description: "The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy."

move.name: Supersonic
move.description: "The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target."

move.name: Swagger
move.description: "The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat."

move.name: Swallow
move.description: "The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP."

move.name: Sweet Kiss
move.description: "The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion."

move.name: Sweet Scent
move.description: "A sweet scent that lowers the foe's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc."

move.name: Swords Dance
move.description: "A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat."

move.name: Tail Whip
move.description: "The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat."

move.name: Teeter Dance
move.description: "The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it."

move.name: Tickle
move.description: "The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats."

move.name: Transform
move.description: "The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set."

move.name: Whirlwind
move.description: "The foe is blown away, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends."

move.name: Wish
move.description: "One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP."

move.name: Work Up
move.description: "The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase."

move.name: Yawn
move.description: "The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn."

move.name: Gunk Shot
move.description: "The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. It may also poison the target."

move.name: Sludge Wave
move.description: "It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit."

move.name: Sludge Bomb
move.description: "Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target."

move.name: Poison Jab
move.description: "The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm seeped with poison. It may also poison the target."

move.name: Cross Poison
move.description: "A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the foe. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Sludge
move.description: "Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target."

move.name: Venoshock
move.description: "The user drenches the foe in a special poisonous liquid. Its power doubles if the target is poisoned."

move.name: Clear Smog
move.description: "The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal."

move.name: Poison Fang
move.description: "The user bites the target with toxic fangs. It may also leave the target badly poisoned."

move.name: Poison Tail
move.description: "The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Acid
move.description: "The foe is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Acid Spray
move.description: "The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Smog
move.description: "The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target."

move.name: Poison Sting
move.description: "The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target."

move.name: Acid Armor
move.description: "The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat."

move.name: Coil
move.description: "The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy."

move.name: Gastro Acid
move.description: "The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid negates the effect of the target's Ability."

move.name: Poison Gas
move.description: "A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon. It may poison those hit."

move.name: Poison Powder
move.description: "The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target."

move.name: Toxic
move.description: "A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn."

move.name: Toxic Spikes
move.description: "The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe's feet. They poison foes that switch into battle."

move.name: Psycho Boost
move.description: "The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat."

move.name: Dream Eater
move.description: "The user eats the dreams of a sleeping foe. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP."

move.name: Future Sight
move.description: "Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target."

move.name: Psystrike
move.description: "The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage."

move.name: Psychic
move.description: "The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Extrasensory
move.description: "The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Psyshock
move.description: "The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage."

move.name: Zen Headbutt
move.description: "The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the foe. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Luster Purge
move.description: "The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Mist Ball
move.description: "A mistlike flurry of down envelops and damages the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Atk."

move.name: Psycho Cut
move.description: "The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Synchronoise
move.description: "Using an odd shock wave, the user damages any Pokémon of the same type as the user."

move.name: Psybeam
move.description: "The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion."

move.name: Heart Stamp
move.description: "The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the foe less wary. It may also cause flinching."

move.name: Confusion
move.description: "The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused."

move.name: Mirror Coat
move.description: "A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken."

move.name: Psywave
move.description: "The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity."

move.name: Stored Power
move.description: "The user attacks with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage."

move.name: Agility
move.description: "The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat."

move.name: Ally Switch
move.description: "The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies."

move.name: Amnesia
move.description: "The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Barrier
move.description: "The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat."

move.name: Calm Mind
move.description: "The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats."

move.name: Cosmic Power
move.description: "The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats."

move.name: Gravity
move.description: "Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation."

move.name: Guard Split
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target's."

move.name: Guard Swap
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target."

move.name: Heal Block
move.description: "For five turns, the foe is prevented from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP."

move.name: Heal Pulse
move.description: "The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP."

move.name: Healing Wish
move.description: "The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured."

move.name: Heart Swap
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target."

move.name: Hypnosis
move.description: "The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep."

move.name: Imprison
move.description: "If the foe knows any move also known by the user, the foe is prevented from using it."

move.name: Kinesis
move.description: "The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. It lowers the target's accuracy."

move.name: Light Screen
move.description: "A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns."

move.name: Lunar Dance
move.description: "The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored."

move.name: Magic Coat
move.description: "A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status."

move.name: Magic Room
move.description: "The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns."

move.name: Meditate
move.description: "The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat."

move.name: Miracle Eye
move.description: "Enables the user to hit a Dark type with any type of move. It also enables the user to hit an evasive foe."

move.name: Power Split
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target's."

move.name: Power Swap
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target."

move.name: Power Trick
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack with its Defense stat."

move.name: Psycho Shift
move.description: "Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target."

move.name: Reflect
move.description: "A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns."

move.name: Rest
move.description: "The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem."

move.name: Role Play
move.description: "The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability."

move.name: Skill Swap
move.description: "The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target."

move.name: Telekinesis
move.description: "The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns."

move.name: Teleport
move.description: "Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited."

move.name: Trick
move.description: "The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own."

move.name: Trick Room
move.description: "The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns."

move.name: Wonder Room
move.description: "The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for 5 turns."

move.name: Head Smash
move.description: "The user attacks the foe with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. The user also takes terrible damage."

move.name: Rock Wrecker
move.description: "The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however."

move.name: Stone Edge
move.description: "The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio."

move.name: Rock Slide
move.description: "Large boulders are hurled at the foes to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch."

move.name: Power Gem
move.description: "The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones."

move.name: Ancient Power
move.description: "The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once."

move.name: Rock Throw
move.description: "The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack."

move.name: Rock Tomb
move.description: "Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement."

move.name: Smack Down
move.description: "The user throws a stone or projectile to attack. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit."

move.name: Rollout
move.description: "The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits."

move.name: Rock Blast
move.description: "The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in quick succession."

move.name: Rock Polish
move.description: "The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat."

move.name: Sandstorm
move.description: "Summons a five-turn sandstorm to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types."

move.name: Stealth Rock
move.description: "The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle."

move.name: Wide Guard
move.description: "The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for a turn. May fail if used in succession."

move.name: Doom Desire
move.description: "Two turns after this move is used, the user blasts the target with a concentrated bundle of light."

move.name: Iron Tail
move.description: "The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. It may also lower the target's Defense stat."

move.name: Meteor Mash
move.description: "The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. It may also raise the user's Attack."

move.name: Flash Cannon
move.description: "The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Iron Head
move.description: "The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch."

move.name: Steel Wing
move.description: "The target is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense stat."

move.name: Mirror Shot
move.description: "The user looses a flash of energy from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy."

move.name: Magnet Bomb
move.description: "The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack will not miss."

move.name: Gear Grind
move.description: "The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target."

move.name: Metal Claw
move.description: "The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat."

move.name: Bullet Punch
move.description: "The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first."

move.name: Gyro Ball
move.description: "The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage."

move.name: Heavy Slam
move.description: "The user slams into the foe with its heavy body. The heavier the user, the greater the damage."

move.name: Metal Burst
move.description: "The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it."

move.name: Autotomize
move.description: "The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat."

move.name: Iron Defense
move.description: "The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat."

move.name: Metal Sound
move.description: "A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat."

move.name: Shift Gear
move.description: "The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed."

move.name: Hydro Cannon
move.description: "The target is hit with a watery blast. The user must rest on the next turn, however."

move.name: Water Spout
move.description: "The user spouts water to damage the foe. The lower the user's HP, the less powerful it becomes."

move.name: Hydro Pump
move.description: "The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure."

move.name: Muddy Water
move.description: "The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the target's accuracy."

move.name: Surf
move.description: "It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water."

move.name: Aqua Tail
move.description: "The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm."

move.name: Crabhammer
move.description: "The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily."

move.name: Dive
move.description: "Diving on the first turn, the user rises and hits on the next turn. It can be used to dive in the ocean."

move.name: Scald
move.description: "The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn."

move.name: Waterfall
move.description: "The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall."

move.name: Razor Shell
move.description: "The user cuts the foe with sharp shells. It may also lower the target's Defense stat."

move.name: Brine
move.description: "If the target's HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power."

move.name: Bubble Beam
move.description: "A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. It may also lower its Speed stat."

move.name: Octazooka
move.description: "The user attacks by spraying ink in the foe's face or eyes. It may also lower the target's accuracy."

move.name: Water Pulse
move.description: "The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target."

move.name: Water Pledge
move.description: "A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, it makes a rainbow."

move.name: Aqua Jet
move.description: "The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first."

move.name: Water Gun
move.description: "The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water."

move.name: Clamp
move.description: "The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns."

move.name: Whirlpool
move.description: "Traps foes in a violent swirling whirlpool for four to five turns."

move.name: Bubble
move.description: "A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats."

move.name: Aqua Ring
move.description: "The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn."

move.name: Rain Dance
move.description: "The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves."

move.name: Soak
move.description: "The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water."

move.name: Water Sport
move.description: "The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle."

move.name: Withdraw
move.description: "The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat."
